languages.text: "Атака началась за несколько часов до рассвета над столицей. В первую очередь был атакован флот: мы успели получить предупреждение об абордаже, прежде чем потеряли связь с экипажами. Их жертва не была напрасной: наземные силы смогли начать мобилизацию, а гражданские приступили к организации обороны".

"The attack began a few hours before dawn over the capital. They first attacked the fleet — we received boarding calls right before we lost communication with the crews. Their sacrifice wasn't for naught — the ground troops had the time to start mobilising, and the civilians went on to organise the defences."
languages.original_text: "Атака началась за несколько часов до рассвета над столицей. В первую очередь был атакован флот: мы успели получить предупреждение об абордаже, прежде чем потеряли связь с экипажами. Их жертва не была напрасной: наземные силы смогли начать мобилизацию, а гражданские приступили к организации обороны".

traits.locale_text: "The attack began before dawn. They first attacked the fleet — we received boarding calls right before we lost communication with the crews. Their sacrifice wasn't for naught — the ground troops had the time to start mobilizing, and the civilians went on to organize the defenses."
traits.speaker: Clemence

Their sacrifice wasn't for naught — the ground troops had the time to start mobilizing, and the civilians went on to organize the defenses."

Their sacrifice wasn't for naught — the ground troops had the time to start mobilising, and the civilians went on to organise the defences."

Their sacrifice wasn't for naught — the ground troops had the time to start mobilising, and the civilians went on to organise the defences."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「襲撃は夜明けの数時間前に首都上空で始まりました。はじめに艦隊が攻撃され、それからクルーとの通信が途絶える直前に乗艦の連絡がありました。彼らの犠牲は無駄にはなりませんでした…おかげで地上部隊が動員開始する時間を稼ぐことができ、民間人が防衛を組織するために動けました」
languages.original_text: "The attack began a few hours before dawn over the capital. They first attacked the fleet — we received boarding calls right before we lost communication with the crews. Their sacrifice wasn't for naught — the ground troops had the time to start mobilising, and the civilians went on to organise the defences."

traits.locale_text: 「襲撃は夜明けの数時間前に首都上空で始まりました。はじめに艦隊が攻撃され、それからクルーとの通信が途絶える直前に乗艦の連絡がありました。彼らの犠牲は無駄にはなりませんでした…おかげで地上部隊が動員開始する時間を稼ぐことができ、民間人が防衛を組織するために動けました」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “袭击发生在天亮之前的几个小时。敌人率先袭击了舰队，我们刚刚接到敌人登舰的报告，舰队就失去了联系。我们的舰队并非白白牺牲，他们争取到了足够的时间，让地面部队进行动员部署，平民也开始组织起了防御。”
languages.original_text: "The attack began a few hours before dawn over the capital. They first attacked the fleet — we received boarding calls right before we lost communication with the crews. Their sacrifice wasn't for naught — the ground troops had the time to start mobilising, and the civilians went on to organise the defences."

traits.locale_text: “袭击发生在天亮之前的几个小时。敌人率先袭击了舰队，我们刚刚接到敌人登舰的报告，舰队就失去了联系。我们的舰队并非白白牺牲，他们争取到了足够的时间，让地面部队进行动员部署，平民也开始组织起了防御。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «El ataque empezó sobre la capital, unas horas antes del amanecer. Empezaron por atacar la flota. Nos informaron de abordajes justo antes de perder el contacto con las tripulaciones. Sin embargo, su sacrificio no fue en vano: las tropas terrestres tuvieron tiempo para empezar a movilizarse y los ciudadanos organizaron las defensas».
languages.original_text: "The attack began a few hours before dawn over the capital. They first attacked the fleet — we received boarding calls right before we lost communication with the crews. Their sacrifice wasn't for naught — the ground troops had the time to start mobilising, and the civilians went on to organise the defences."

traits.locale_text: «El ataque empezó sobre la capital, unas horas antes del amanecer. Empezaron por atacar la flota. Nos informaron de abordajes justo antes de perder el contacto con las tripulaciones. Sin embargo, su sacrificio no fue en vano: las tropas terrestres tuvieron tiempo para empezar a movilizarse y los ciudadanos organizaron las defensas».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « L'attaque a débuté quelques heures avant que l'aube se lève sur la capitale. Ils s'en sont d'abord pris à la flotte, qui a transmis des alertes à l'abordage juste avant que les communications soient interrompues. Leur sacrifice n'a pas été vain, cependant : les troupes au sol ont eu le temps de se mobiliser et les civils ont organisé leur défense également. »
languages.original_text: "The attack began a few hours before dawn over the capital. They first attacked the fleet — we received boarding calls right before we lost communication with the crews. Their sacrifice wasn't for naught — the ground troops had the time to start mobilising, and the civilians went on to organise the defences."

traits.locale_text: « L'attaque a débuté quelques heures avant que l'aube se lève sur la capitale. Ils s'en sont d'abord pris à la flotte, qui a transmis des alertes à l'abordage juste avant que les communications soient interrompues. Leur sacrifice n'a pas été vain, cependant : les troupes au sol ont eu le temps de se mobiliser et les civils ont organisé leur défense également. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Der Angriff begann einige Stunden vor Tagesanbruch über der Hauptstadt. Zuerst ging es gegen die Flotte – wir erhielten Meldungen, dass geentert wurde, dann brach die Kommunikation mit den Crews zusammen. Ihr Opfer war nicht umsonst – die Bodentruppen gewannen genügend Zeit, um die Mobilisierung einzuleiten, und die Zivilisten bereiteten die Verteidigung vor."
languages.original_text: "The attack began a few hours before dawn over the capital. They first attacked the fleet — we received boarding calls right before we lost communication with the crews. Their sacrifice wasn't for naught — the ground troops had the time to start mobilising, and the civilians went on to organise the defences."

traits.locale_text: "Der Angriff begann einige Stunden vor Tagesanbruch über der Hauptstadt. Zuerst ging es gegen die Flotte – wir erhielten Meldungen, dass geentert wurde, dann brach die Kommunikation mit den Crews zusammen. Ihr Opfer war nicht umsonst – die Bodentruppen gewannen genügend Zeit, um die Mobilisierung einzuleiten, und die Zivilisten bereiteten die Verteidigung vor."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Saldırı, başkentte şafak sökmeden birkaç saat önce başladı. Önce filoya saldırdılar. Bordalama haberleri geldikten hemen sonra mürettebatla irtibatımız kesildi. Boş yere can vermediler ama. Yerdeki birliklerimiz, harekete geçmek için vakit kazandı. Sayelerinde siviller de savunma hatlarını hazırlayabildi."
languages.original_text: "The attack began a few hours before dawn over the capital. They first attacked the fleet — we received boarding calls right before we lost communication with the crews. Their sacrifice wasn't for naught — the ground troops had the time to start mobilising, and the civilians went on to organise the defences."

traits.locale_text: "Saldırı, başkentte şafak sökmeden birkaç saat önce başladı. Önce filoya saldırdılar. Bordalama haberleri geldikten hemen sonra mürettebatlarla irtibatımız kesildi. Fedakârlıkları boşa değildi, yerdeki birliklerimizin harekete geçmesi için vakit kazandılar. Onların sayesinde siviller de savunma hatlarını hazırlayabildi."
traits.speaker: Clemence
